organizations: Sophie Aubrey News Corp Australia Network Share Email
title: ‘Hey Kanye, f--k yo 30 showers’
text:
‘Hey Kanye, f--k yo 30 showers’ 12:03 PM Sophie Aubrey AMBER Rose broke into sobs opening up about her exes Kanye West and Wiz Khalifa when leading her first SlutWalk protest. But her mum had her back. ‘Blunt thought he’d start WWIII’ 11:56 AM Charis Chang MANY know James Blunt as “that annoying singer” but he’s actually a bit of a badass. His previous career makes that pretty obvious. When movies go wrong: ‘Cops came with real guns’ 11:50 AM Andrew Bucklow THERE is a special police department which exists purely to help movies and TV shows film scenes with police. And boy do they have some stories. Elle: ‘I thought I had cancer’ 11:42 AM Network Writers SHE was mocked mercilessly for carrying a urine pH tester in her purse. Now Elle Macpherson has revealed the reason for her unusual health practice. Secrets behind the biggest film of the year 11:35 AM Maria Lewis WHEN news about water on Mars trickled into NASA headquarters, director Ridley Scott was standing right there. There’s a reason The Martian has been such a big hit. Carrey’s ex ‘overdosed on star’s pills’ 11:23 AM Network Writers JIM Carrey’s ex-girlfriend Cathriona White was reportedly found next to three bottles of pills prescribed to an alias used by her ex-lover. Will Rove replace Dan and Maz on radio? 11:06 AM Staff writers THE former talk show host is set to return to Australia next year to host a breakfast radio show in Sydney, according to a new report. Turnbull’s awkward Hemsworth moment 10:27 AM Lanai Scarr National Political Reporter MALCOLM Turnbull may have just blown his ‘cool PM’ image after an edited Facebook post proved he’s not as up-to-date with pop culture as he’d have us think. Amber Rose leads SlutWalk protest, breaks down speaking of ex-lovers Kanye West and Wiz Khalifa October 5, 2015 11:03am Choking up ... Amber Rose struggles to hold back tears as she speaks of her exes Kanye West and Wiz Khalifa. Picture: YouTube/Hollywood Fix Sophie Aubrey News Corp Australia Network Share Email a friend 
WARNING: Graphic language 
AMBER Rose was a bundle of emotions when she was joined by hundreds of scantily-clad backers as she led a protest against sexual violence and ‘slut-shaming’. 
The curvaceous 31-year-old actor and model was all smiles as she led the SlutWalk march in Los Angeles with the support of her mother, waving a sign that read ‘Strippers Have Feelings Too’. 
But when she opened up onstage about being slut-shamed as a mere 14-year-old and raised her nasty high-profile breakups in front of the crowd of people at the weekend event, she broke down in tears. Proud protester 
In a clip posted on YouTube , Rose spoke of her emotional pain in the wake of slanderous comments made be her rapper ex-lovers, Kanye West and Wiz Khalifa . 
Most famously, Kanye said in a radio interview he had to take 30 showers after breaking up with Rose before Kim Kardashian would have considered hooking up with him. 
Meanwhile, she was labelled a ‘stripper’ and a ‘ho’ in song For Everybody by Wiz, with whom she has two-year-old son Sebastian. Brimming brigade 
“All I did was ever love him. I just loved him so much and gave him a beautiful son, and to be told that I was nothing but a stripper, it hurt,” Rose confessed between sobs. Gone separate ways ... Amber Rose and ex-husband Wiz Khalifa had been very publicly affectionate in their time together. Picture: Getty Images/Jason Merritt Source: Getty Images 
“I want to forgive Kanye for what he said about me. I want to let all that negativity go. I also forgive Wiz for what he said,” she continued, before asking people to also learn to forgive and help others instead of letting anger bubble away inside. 
“I suggest you guys to the same and I’ll tell you why: because ... people are ignorant and you have to be the bigger person and be the positive person to forgive and move on and help other people move on around you.” Bitter ending ... Kanye West and Amber Rose were together for two years, breaking up in 2010. Picture: AP/Peter Kramer Source: Supplied 
Her supercool mum was apparently less forgiving, pictured on Instagram brandishing a sign with the words ‘F--- YO 30 showers!’ in an epic slap-down directed at Kanye. Motherly love 
SlutWalks are part of an international movement , including in Australia , which fights sexist double standards placed on women and the insidious culture of blaming rape victims for their fashion choices. 
Rose is increasingly active in the women’s rights movement, having set up a non-profit organisation named the Amber Rose Foundation and a GoFundMe page supporting the cause. 
She vows that her Los Angeles SlutWalk event will be the first of many. Rose's backers
